# ciscoise_guest_user_sms (Data Source)

It performs update operation on GuestUser.

- This data source action allows the client to update a guest user sms by ID.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ciscoise_guest_user_sms" "example" {
  provider  = ciscoise
  id        = "string"
  portal_id = "string"
}
```
